name: by lantern light
description:
This game was made for Brackey's game jam, a 7 day game jam with the theme of light, the goal of the game is to keep you and your lantern alive, to do so, kill enemies, as they have fuel and captives who will fight along your side. The game was inspired by the game "right click to necromance"( https://juicybeast.itch.io/right-click-to-necromance) I hope you enjoy what of the game ended up done. 

controls : use wasd to move around, all characters attack automatically when in range

credits : 

coding and music : Christopher Abarta

team web page : https://burnttoastgames.weebly.com/
